doc.field: Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 53 [2]--The Right Stuff, Episode No. 170[Air Date: 10/1/1985]
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 53 [2]--The Right Stuff, Episode No. 170[Air Date: 10/1/1985]

Pride and ProgressNews-highlights:1. Nation's largest insurance companies try to access HTVLIII test results to determine applicants' insurability2. Rhode Island governor signs pro-gay legislation into law3. Massachusetts House of Representatives defeats a gay rights bill, AIDS scareCOMMERCIAL: NGTF Fund for Human Dignity with "Dear Abby" Abigail Van Buren4. Racine, Wisconsin nurse loses job because of sexual orientation5. Wisconsin QUEST Program starts housing program for low income gay and lesbian senior citizens6. Episcopal church speaks out against AIDS anxiety7. Federal government approves HPA23 for experimental use in the United States8. Californian republican, congressman Robert Dornan speaks out against AIDS anxiety in The House of RepresentativesCOMMERCIAL: "New York Native" with Quentin Crisp8. Sports, includes clip9. Healthline: Conversations with GMHC: Dr. Scott Croxson, Research Fellow, Beth Israel Medical Center, discusses AIDS related conflicts10. Closing credits
The Right Stuff:1. Interview with Candido Mendes, Director of Gay Parade Day, includes coverage of paradeCOMMERCIAL: Carnaval in Rio de Janeiro, Islanders' Club2. Broadway Confidential, "After Hours," includes clipCOMMERCIAL: GMHC Healthy Sex Workshops3. Cabaret Beat, includes clip of Bradshaw Smith
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 53 [2]--The Right Stuff, Episode No. 170[Air Date: 10/1/1985]: October 1985
